main event: Observers reported seeing a round-shaped object with red lights flashing in Sidney, Nebraska on October 14, 1966.
interesting points: The object had no exhaust, trail, or sound,It was observed for over an hour,The aircraft was confirmed to be in a holding pattern during the sighting,The object appeared to be the size of the Little Dipper and North Star,Two witnesses described seeing two colors of lights (red and green) flashing alternately.
sighted object: a round shaped object with flashing red and green lights
witness description: Two adults and one unspecified witness observed the sighting.
